features: ✔【Durable & Vintage Messenger Bag】: This leather bag is made of supple textured PU leather with a cowhide pattern which is durable and water-repellent. The durable thick nylon lining covers the inside of the bag, and the thick foam compartment in the middle can provide protection for your computer from collisions and impacts, which can ensure the use of long-term.

✔【Multiple Pockets & Large Capacity】Roomy compartments provide separate space for your 15.6” laptop, iPad, files, pens, wallet, notebooks, and all your items. The interior features multiple compartments, including a padded pocket specifically designed for laptops, and a main compartment for A4 magazines, keys, etc. There is a front compartment with a zipper pocket for an iPad and other essentials. Additionally, it features a back anti-theft pocket for securing your phone or passport.

✔【Practical Mens Work Bag】Featuring a comfortable leather handle, our computer bag offers practicality and comfort. Convenient magnetic snaps and smooth zip closure for double security. The sturdy metal buckle allows for easy conversion from a handbag to a shoulder bag or satchel bag. Additionally, the metal bottom nails make the bag wear and stain-proof. In addition, a built-in key ring will keep you from forgetting your keys.

✔【Perfect 15.6 inch Laptop Bag】:The size of this Laptop messenger bag is 16.1"L * 5.1"W * 12.6"H, Weight:3.08lbs. The appropriate briefcase size is specially designed for business, you can install the office equipment and documents you need when you are on a business trip to meet customers. This practical messenger bag is also a great choice when you are facing a situation where you need to move your work home.

✔【Removable Strap & Widely-Use】The laptop bag comes with a removable and adjustable shoulder strap for easy carrying. It can be used as a crossbody bag, allowing you to free your hands. The padded shoulder strap can be adjusted to fit different heights, ensuring comfort even when carrying the bag for long periods of time. This vintage messenger bag can be used as a messenger bag, business laptop bag, satchel bag, and shoulder bag. It is also a perfect gift for your husband, friend, and family.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vintage Mens Messenger Bag Made from high-quality vintage leather, it showcases a classic style and texture. It is good for college, business, work, travel, overnight, etc.Durable and long-lasting, crafted with premium waterproof Leather material, this laptop briefcase offers protection against dust and splashes.Multiple compartments and pockets for easy organization and storage of documents, laptops, files, and more.Equipped with a comfortable handle and adjustable shoulder strap for different carrying options.Multi-functional, can be used as a briefcase, crossbody bag, or shoulder bag. Practical gifts for father, husband, and friends.

Points of upkeeping 1.Apply cream/moisture lotion onto the leather surface and use a soft cloth to complete the upkeep. 2.Avoid cleaning products with alcohol, turpentine, or other mineral spirits as they will discolor and dry out leather. 3.Never allow water to soak into your bag. If the bag gets wet, do not use a hair dryer on it. Instead, absorb as much water as possible with a thick microfiber hand towel and allow the bag to air dry. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and stylish
reviews.reviewText: Nice bag for the price. Roomy and convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect bag for work, very sturdy and great quality. Can’t beat the price for the quality you’re getting.Shipping was fast as well 👌🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Bag for Men, Excellent gift
reviews.reviewText: I got this bag as a Christmas gift for my husband As an investment into his style and also his work. I believe a bag like this is a must have for any man! It is dapper, manly, beautiful leather. It fits laptop and many other items perfectly. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because it was unfortunately a bit on the larger size and my hubby is not a tall man. So just a heads up for anyone else who may relate! I also think that if this men’s bag also had attachments to be transformed to a leather book bag aswell that would be perfect!!! Overall, beautiful quality bag. The color is the perfect middle ground of a light and dark brown leather. Looks expensive! Great addition for any man’s closet. Wonderful gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this bag, looks great feels high quality and is excellent value. It even looks like leather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bag for men that's not expensive
reviews.reviewText: This is a great bag. It has a good amount of space considering its size. It is easy to wear across the body while looking masculine. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cost/quality great match
reviews.reviewText: Looks are outstanding and the strap features are exactly what I was looking for. Perfect Xmas gift for son retiring from military duty and beginning a new life of laptop and travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but very heavy
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited to receive this briefcase, since it looks to have a lot of storage room and pockets for organizing. It does have the room and organization options, but this means that the bag is made up of a lot of leather, which makes it very heavy for everyday use.It does seem to be waterproof and scratch resistant, which I appreciate, but I feel like the weight of the bag makes me reluctant to use it all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it Well Made
reviews.reviewText: I've bought several type of cases or tool bags to carry my Piano Tuning tools. This is the best I have gotten for my needs. I don't like carrying a heavy tool bag with tools I don't use that often. This is just the right size and weight for my everyday use. Very good quality.
